text: The 1958 Volta a Catalunya was the 38th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 7 September to 14 September 1958. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Richard Van Genechten. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 52" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 31" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 53" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 46" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 11' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 17' 29" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 20' 34" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 21' 55" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 21' 58" |} |} ==References== 1958 Volta Category:1958 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1958 sports events
